column5: I'm taking a fly-in from Igance next month to Flindt Lake. The outfitter is Ignace Outposts. Anyone know anything about this lake? Any info is appreciated. Jerry

I have fished a small portion of the Flindt River that flows in and out of several lakes west and north of Savant Lake, my 13 year old daughter caught a 10 pound walleye from there, the walleye fishing should be excellent in the main lake, always wanted to make it in there, I think you can fly in, or take the train from the town of Savant Lake. You should do very well.
